q1: How do rate Sweden's chances in their quarter-final against England?
a1: I give them a 30 percent chance of advancing to the next round.
a2: Just a feeling I have based on their previous performance in World Cup tournaments.
q3: If it goes to penalty kicks, what are their chances?
a3: A3: I think they would win in penality kicks. The England team is young and may choke.
q4: Did Zlatan's absence help sweden over perform in the world cup?
a4: I believe Zlatan's time was done, this team of Sweden is the new generation coming through and they're playing with alot of confidence
